title: Synchronization and desynchronization in ensembles of mobile agents
authors: E. M. Varvarin, G. V. Osipov
abstract:
Mechanisms of emergence and destruction are analyzed, as well as
characteristics of synchronous and asynchronous modes of behavior of ensembles
(swarms) of interacting mobile agents moving according to chaotic phase
trajectories of Rossler and Lorenz systems. The possibility of organizing
sequential and parallel motion of agents based on the effect of chaotic phase
synchronization is demonstrated.
